greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists n terms, starting with n^2+n-1, with gaps = n^2-1 between successive terms.
comment: Note that the last term of the n-th row is the n-th cube A000578(n).
formula: Sum_{k=1..n} T(n,k)= n*(n^3 + n^2 + n - 1)/2 (row sums). - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 20 2009
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 09 2009
ext: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 06 2009
